Description:
Welcome to the Golden Age of Piracy !
1715 , Caribbean. Pirates have become true masters of the sea and land , by organizing their own republic wickedness , greed and cruelty.
Among these robbers noticeable young Captain Edward Kenuey . Reputation fighter and adventurer allowed him to win the respect of such legends as Blackbeard , but also drew in the ancient war between the Assassins and the Templars , in a war that could destroy all that we have created the pirates .
A detailed worlds of Assassin's Creed. Stand shoulder to shoulder with such legendary pirates like Blackbeard , Calico Jack and Benjamin Hornigold to found the Republic of lawlessness in the Bahamas and take part in the chaos that has become synonymous with the golden age of piracy. Explore 50 unique locations - from Kingston to Nassau - where you can experience the life of a pirate . Go up to the bridge of his ship , improve it , look for the lost treasure , hunt for rare animals and scour wrecks .
